content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Greetings Juan, thank you for your interest in my apartment. I understand that you are looking for a place to live in New York, and I am happy to offer you this opportunity. However, before we discuss the rental price, I would like to clarify a few things.

Firstly, can you please provide me with more information about your budget and the length of time you are planning to stay in New York? This will help me to determine the best rental price for you.

Additionally, I have some questions about your living preferences. Do you prefer a quiet and peaceful location, or are you looking for a bustling and lively area? Are you looking for a one-bedroom or two-bedroom apartment? These details will help me to better understand your needs and provide you with the best options.

Please let me know your answers, and we can proceed with the negotiation.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for a one-bedroom apartment. I prefer a quiet and peaceful location. My budget is 800 Euros per month, and I plan to stay for 12 months.

Thanks for your time and consideration.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Thank you for providing me with that information, Juan. I appreciate your interest in my apartment, and I am happy to offer you a one-bedroom apartment in a quiet and peaceful location for 800 Euros per month.

However, I must clarify that the rental price is negotiable, and I am willing to discuss any additional details you may have in mind. For example, if you are looking for a longer lease term, we can discuss the possibility of a lower rental price.

Please let me know if you are interested in this offer, and we can proceed with the negotiation.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am interested in the offer of 800 Euros per month. I agree to the price of 800 Euros per month for 12 months.

Thank you for your time and consideration. I look forward to moving into the apartment.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Thank you for your decision, Juan. I am glad that you have agreed to the rental price of 800 Euros per month for 12 months. I appreciate your interest in my apartment, and I am looking forward to having you as a tenant.

Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns, and I will be happy to assist you. I will also provide you with the necessary documentation and instructions to move into the apartment.

Thank you again for choosing my apartment, and I look forward to welcoming you as a tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine
